subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The San Diego Chargers and running back LaDainian Tomlinson agreed to a reworked three-year contract. “The alternative was just unthinkable; he belongs in San Diego,” Dean Spanos, the team president, said.
snippet: The San Diego Chargers and running back LaDainian Tomlinson agreed to a reworked three-year contract. “The alternative was just unthinkable; he belongs in San Diego,” Dean Spanos, the team president, said.
